availability.p: This work is the property of the University of Memphis Libraries, Special Collections Department, Ned R. McWherter Library, Memphis, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the University of Memphis Libraries, 126 Ned R. McWherter Library, The University of Memphis, Memphis, TN 38152-6500.

bibl.title: [Remittance] 1836 Feb. 22 [to] Andrew J [ackson] Coffee / Andrew Jackson
bibl.author: Jackson, Andrew
bibl.note: This document is a remittance to Andrew Jackson Coffee from Andrew Jackson. The remittance, dated February 22, 1836, is for a $250 reimbursement to Coffee for his expenses at West Point and to and from Washington.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p: Remitted to Andrew J. Jackson Coffee on the
20th of January 1836 to Philadelphia agreeable to his letter $25 to bring him to Washington —— $25

26th of January 1836 check to
Col Colonel DeRussy to meet A. J. Andrew Jackson Coffees' expences expenses at West Point & for traveling travelling to Washington $135 —
26th of January for to bear his expences expenses home, he being anxious to go on home — 80 —
22nd February 1836 ten dollars for his expence expenses home having spent part of the former sum received — 10 —
